description.name: Jacket size S
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Work Jacket made of Cotton (35%) and Polyester (65%)

  • Material weight: 267 g/m2

  • 7 pockets, including 4 with Velcro fastening

  • Mobile phone pocket

  • Pen/pencil pocket

  • Zip fastener

  • Width adjustment at the jacket bottom with buttons

  • Reflective components on chest and back

  • Strengthened pockets and elbows area with Polyester fabric

  • Additional stitching

  • ID insert

  • CE Certificate


Technical Data



  • Material Composition: 35% Cotton, 65% Polyester

  • Material Weight: 267 g/m2

  • Size: S


Size Chart








































Size S (48) M (50) L (52) LD (54) XL (56) XXL (58)
A 92 - 96 cm 96 - 104 cm 104 - 108 cm 108 - 116 cm 116 - 124 cm 124 - 132 cm
B 64 - 72 cm 72 - 80 cm 80 - 88 cm 88 - 96 cm 96 - 104 cm 104 - 112 cm
C 164 - 170 cm 170 - 176 cm 176 - 182 cm 182 - 188 cm 188 - 194 cm 194 - 200 cm
